text: Sergei Nikolayev may refer to: * Sergei Nikolayev (footballer), Russian football player * Sergei Nikolayev (ice hockey), Russian ice hockey player * Sergey Nikolaev (cyclist), Russian cyclist * Sergey Nikolayev (shot putter) (born 1966), Russian shot putter * Sergei Nikolaev (linguist), Russian linguist
title: Sergei Nikolayev
